Name: Too Spicy
Description: Too Spicy is a light gun shooter arcade game developed and published by Sega. Released on SEGA Lindbergh Red in 2007, the game features head-to-head shootouts in a third-person perspective.

SetupDetails.Details:
Game Setup

  • Ensure you have the latest version of TeknoParrot.
  • Extract the game files to a preferred directory.
BulletPoints: Ensure you have the latest version of TeknoParrot.
Extract the game files to a preferred directory.

CommonIssues.Question: Sound isn't working
CommonIssues.Answer: Please make sure your TeknoParrot is updated; this was an old issue that was resolved.

CommonIssues.Question: AMD GPU Issues
CommonIssues.Answer: Characters may appear broken or have graphical glitches on AMD GPUs.

Name: 3D Cosplay Mahjong
Description: 3D Cosplay Mahjong is a Japanese arcade mahjong game featuring 3D models of cosplay characters. Released on Taito NESiCAxLive in 2013.

Name: America's Army Arcade
Description: America's Army Arcade is an arcade adaptation of the America's Army PC game, featuring military-themed first-person shooter gameplay. Released on Global VR PC Based hardware in 2007.

SetupDetails.Details:
Game Setup

  • Executable is "armyops-bin" found in <root>/System/.
  • Configure your controls within TeknoParrot.
BulletPoints: Executable is "armyops-bin" found in <root>/System/.
Configure your controls within TeknoParrot.

Name: After Burner Climax
Description: After Burner Climax is an arcade combat flight game, part of the After Burner series by Sega. Released on SEGA Lindbergh Yellow in 2006.

SetupDetails.Details:
Game Setup

  • Extract abc.bin (with PowerISO or similar tools).
  • Copy 'abc' folder from disk0 to disk1 and run the game from there.

AMD GPU Fix

  • Download the AMD fix.
  • Extract files to your After Burner Climax\disk1 folder and overwrite existing files.
BulletPoints: Extract abc.bin (with PowerISO or similar tools).
Copy 'abc' folder from disk0 to disk1 and run the game from there.
Download the AMD fix.
Extract files to your After Burner Climax\disk1 folder and overwrite existing files.

CommonIssues.Question: Graphical issues with shadows
CommonIssues.Answer: Currently, shadows do not render properly on some GPUs.

CommonIssues.Question: General Issues
CommonIssues.Answer: Game has no shadows due to incomplete emulation.

Name: Action Deka
Description: Action Deka is a sports game by Konami that features various athletic events. Released on Konami PC Based in 2008.

Name: Akai Katana Shin
Description: Akai Katana Shin is a horizontal shoot 'em up game developed by Cave, featuring a unique mechanic where players can use a slash system. Released on Taito NESiCAxLive in 2012.

SetupDetails.Details:
Game Setup

  • Executable is "game.exe" found in game's root folder.
BulletPoints: Executable is "game.exe" found in game's root folder.

Name: Akuma
Description: Akuma is an arcade shooter developed by GAMEWAX. Released in 2004, it features action-packed shooting gameplay.

Name: Senjin Aleste
Description: Senjin Aleste is a vertical scrolling shoot 'em up game, part of the Aleste series. Released on SEGA ALLS in 2021.

Name: Aliens Armageddon
Description: Aliens Armageddon is a rail shooter arcade game developed by Raw Thrills. It is based on the Aliens franchise and released in 2014 on Raw Thrills Linux PC Based hardware.

CommonIssues.Question: Game Not Launching
CommonIssues.Answer: The game may require additional files or patches to run correctly.

Name: Aliens: Extermination
Description: Aliens: Extermination is a light gun shooter game developed by Global VR, based on the Aliens film series, offering cooperative shooting gameplay. Released in 2006.

SetupDetails.Details:
Game Setup

  • Executable is "aliens.exe" or "aliens dehasped.exe" found in the game's root folder.
  • Install the appropriate codec to run in-game movies.
BulletPoints: Executable is "aliens.exe" found in the game's root folder.
Install the appropriate codec to run in-game movies.

CommonIssues.Question: Game runs too fast on Intel or AMD GPUs
CommonIssues.Answer: Use an FPS limiter to fix the speed issue.

CommonIssues.Question: Movies within the game do not play
CommonIssues.Answer: Install the proper codec as mentioned in the setup details.

Name: Super Alpine Racer
Description: Super Alpine Racer is a skiing arcade game combining motion-based gameplay with downhill skiing. Released on Raw Thrills PC Based hardware in 2014.

Name: AquaPazza: Aquaplus Dream Match
Description: AquaPazza is a crossover fighting game featuring characters from various Aquaplus visual novels. Released on Taito NESiCAxLive in 2011.

Name: Ge-Sen Love Plus Pengo!
Description: Ge-Sen Love Plus Pengo! is a compilation arcade game featuring several titles, including Pengo! Released on SEGA RingEdge 2 in 2012.
MultiplayerDetails: Supports up to 4 players depending on the game.

Name: Arcana Heart 2 for NESiCAxLive
Description: Arcana Heart 2 is a 2D fighting game developed by Examu. The NESiCAxLive version was released in 2012 with improved netplay features.

Name: Arcana Heart 3 (eX-Board)
Description: Arcana Heart 3 is a fighting game developed by Examu and is the third installment in the Arcana Heart series. Released in 2009.

Name: Arcana Heart 3: LOVE MAX SixStarS!!!!!!
Description: Arcana Heart 3: LOVE MAX SixStarS!!!!!! is a revised version of Arcana Heart 3, announcing new characters and balance changes. Released in 2013.

Name: Arctic Thunder
Description: Arctic Thunder is a snowmobile racing arcade game developed by Midway Games, released in 2000.
MultiplayerDetails: Supports up to 2 players in simultaneous races.

Description: Ballistics is a racing arcade game that offers a unique take on vehicular combat, released in 2002 on Trio-Tech PC Based hardware.

CommonIssues.Question: In-game brakes
CommonIssues.Answer: Brakes have been fixed in recent TeknoParrot version; please ensure you are using the latest version.

CommonIssues.Question: Windowed mode
CommonIssues.Answer: Windowed mode has been fixed in recent TeknoParrot version; please ensure you are using the latest version.

CommonIssues.Question: Game Speed Fix
CommonIssues.Answer: If the game appears to be running faster than it should, set your monitor to 60 Hz.
